name: Zythia: The Nine Realms
description:
"Zythia: The Nine Realms" is a 2D semi top-down, open world, non-linear adventure game.

Play as the Guardian of Zythia and restore the power of the nine realms!

The land is procedurally generated every time you play, offering a unique non-linear gameplay in an open world format with a retro-style.

Face challenging enemies in a hunt for treasure!

Great soundtrack by Nanotron!

An instant classic with a theme that feels older than time itself.

You'll wonder why nobody made it sooner!
